description.narrative: JPO Ludovica AMATUCCI (Italy) Main Duties: Under the overall supervision of the UR and Director of the Regional Hub in ETH (PTC/PPF/FLD/ETH), the JPO is providing technical and administrative support to the programme for the successful attainment of the programmes objectives. Specifically, Ms. Amatucci: (i.) assists in identifying, developing and promoting field-level technical cooperation programmes related to UNIDO mandate with governments and other partners; (ii.) assists in monitoring programme/project implementation related to the PCP ETH and reports on best practices, successful stories, and lessons learnt; (iii.) establishes a network with INGO, local NGO, UN, private sector companies, foundations, and other relevant bodies, as potential partners in the PCP ETH projects; (iv.) assists in organizing UNIDO forum related to Agro-Industries in particular; (v.) assists in identifying agribusiness enterprises to participate in the Integrated Agro-industrial parks; (vi.) prepares regular reports for PTC/PPF/FLD/ETH on the formulation/implementation status of technical cooperation. Additionally, the JPO supports the UR in the co-ordination of UNIDO#s activities in the country and specifically carry out the following duties: 1. undertakes research, collect and analyze information on various macro-economic indic
